description:
With this DLC you will unlock:

- stylized long curly pink hair
- stylized medium length brown hair with braid
- stylized medium lenght violet hair with two buns
- stylized white hair with two bows
- casual long mint hair with white beanie
- white short dress with red stripe
- red short dress with white stripe
- elegant red long dress with white buttons 
- white shoes with red bows
- elegant red stiletto shoes with white pearls
- red elegant handbag with flower pattern 
- 1000 coins to change the look of your doll's house

Allow your creativity to create more styles for your paper princess!
name: DIY Paper Doll: Classy Look
